javaslang.lang

Class Lang

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaslang.lang.Lang

  • public final class Lang
extends java.lang.Object
    General Java languange extensions.

      • require

        public static void require(boolean condition,
                           java.lang.String message)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Runtime check which will throw an IllegalStateException containing the given message if the condition is false.
        Parameters:
        condition - A boolean
        message - A message An error message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If condition is false, contains the message.

      • require

        public static void require(boolean condition,
                           java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> messageSupplier)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Runtime check which will throw an IllegalStateException containing the given message if the condition is false. The message is computed only if the condition is false.
        Parameters:
        condition - A boolean
        messageSupplier - An error message, computed lazily.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If condition is false, contains the message.
